mapper.select: SELECT sa_date, items, savings, order_num FROM ( SELECT sav.sa_date, so.items, sav.savings, sav.order_num FROM shop_order so, savings sav WHERE so.order_num = sav.order_num AND sav.order_num IN ( SELECT order_num FROM shop_order WHERE user_key = #{key} ) ORDER BY order_num desc ) WHERE order_num <= ( #{pagingVO.pageNum} * #{pagingVO.amount} ) AND order_num > (#{pagingVO.pageNum} - 1) * #{pagingVO.amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM shop_order WHERE user_key = #{key} AND cancel = 0 ORDER BY order_num desc ) WHERE order_num <= #{pagingVO.pageNum} * #{pagingVO.amount} AND order_num > (#{pagingVO.pageNum} - 1) * #{pagingVO.amount}
